game.name: Ninja Monster Killer
game.description: In this platform game called ninja monster killer, your job is to destroy all monsters and to pass all 5 levels to win the game. watch your self the monsters can hurt you, and you can loose your life. Watch out if you fall from platform the game will over and you need to start over again.
